content: This PR has had a short style review by @Martin Dvořák, but no other activity in two months so far. Would anybody like to take a look? (@Eric Rodriguez You indicated you're interested in reviewing computability PRs. If you happen to have a moment to give this a look, this is certainly very welcome.)
Speaking of computability PRs, they are sadly stuck at the maintainer-merge step after I've reviewed them :sad: : #21585
